title: Battery Life Calculator for LED Noodle Costumes
creator: Moving Rainbow Project
subject: Electronics, Mathematics, Physics
description: Interactive simulation for calculating battery life of LED noodle costumes based on number of LEDs, brightness level, and battery type. Students learn to apply mathematical formulas to real-world engineering problems.

educational.subject: STEM
educational.topic: Battery Life Calculation, Power Consumption, LED Electronics
learningObjectives: Apply the battery life formula to calculate runtime
Analyze the relationship between current draw and battery capacity
Evaluate trade-offs between brightness, LED count, and battery life
Compare different battery options for specific design requirements

accessibility.description: Interactive battery life calculator with descriptive labels and high contrast visualization

model.name: Battery Life Calculation

variables.name: currentPerNoodle
variables.description: Maximum current draw per LED noodle

variables.name: numberOfNoodles
variables.description: Number of LED noodles in the costume

variables.name: brightnessFactor
variables.description: Brightness level as a fraction of maximum

variables.name: totalCurrent
variables.description: Total current draw of all noodles

equations.name: Total Current Draw
equations.description: Calculate total current consumption based on number of noodles and brightness

equations.name: Battery Life
equations.description: Calculate estimated battery runtime in hours

assumptions: Linear relationship between brightness and current draw
All noodles operate at same brightness level
limitations: Does not account for battery discharge curves
Does not include conversion efficiency losses
Battery age and quality variations not considered

scaffolding: Start with default values to show basic calculation
Adjust one parameter at a time to see individual effects
Compare multiple scenarios to understand trade-offs
assessmentOpportunities: Solve for required parameters given constraints

learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of battery life calculator for led noodle costumes
Explore battery life calculator for led noodle costumes through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of battery life calculator for led noodle costumes to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on battery life calculator for led noodle costumes
